name: Choose Your Own Jam-venture
description:
A game made for CGX Grad Jam Winter 2021.

Choose Your Own Jam-venture, named after the game jam theme, is a trio of mini-games based on three story ideas. 

The Sand Sifter
This mini-game has you digging for things in the desert. To help you, you have a radar overlay, though it only updates where it is used. 

Junction 83
This mini-game has you changing minecart rail intersections to help minecarts get to where they need to go.  

The Knights of Mymip
This mini-game has you helping the knights of Mymip with their wall climbing training.

To date, only the Sand Sifter mini-game is playable. 

Controls: 
space/enter/z - select/interact
up/down/left/right arrow - move
